Authors: Udjaja Y., Sasmoko, Rumapea A.S., Putra F.A., Rahmansyah T.
Title: Architecture of High-Order Thinking Skills Game to Improve Ability
Source title: TALE 2019 - 2019 IEEE International Conference on Engineering, Technology and Education
Affiliations: School of Computer Science Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Bina Nusantara University, Primary Teacher Education Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Udjaja, Y., School of Computer Science Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Sasmoko, Bina Nusantara University, Primary Teacher Education Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Rumapea, A.S., Bina Nusantara University, Primary Teacher Education Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Putra, F.A., Bina Nusantara University, Primary Teacher Education Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Rahmansyah, T., Bina Nusantara University, Primary Teacher Education Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: There have been many activities to train the brain to remain active, one of its activities is by playing games. Games with the right presentation can train the brain as a whole. This research is focused on High-Order Thinking Skills (HOTS) in order to be able to train the brain's ability in players. This was made so that the implementation problems in disadvantaged, frontier and outermost areas could be overcome. © 2019 IEEE.
Index Keywords: Brain; High order thinking skills; Engineering education
